title: Yes, matchmaking ->IS BROKEN<- and here is real evidence!
body:
Okay, I'm playing with a team of 4: These are all 4 people from the same group, and we've played together before, for months now!

We're missing one member of our group; computer problem. . so, we'll take a random.

. . .And it's this guy!!! Seriously!??!? 0/10/1 Yasuo??! Bronze Yasuo?? That's the guy matchmaking puts on our team??

Seriously??!

There are some issues with matchmaking, and it's time to accept that, and actually work to build a better matchmaking system.


Seriously. . . a bronze, 0/10/1 yasuo. . . seriously??!!?!?!!!?!? We got our full team here, and we're going into ranked mode. . thanks for the warm up, Rito. .  >:(


https://s32.postimg.org/5sbfedm9x/seriously.png

replies.body: Bro you were the only silver in this game and you were silver 5. The rest were all bronze. Shut up and get over your self and accept the fact that you're bad and realize that everyone is in the same MMR range and stop having NaCl

lol did you see the team comp you have, the kda of all players (your 4 man premade and the random) all of you had negative kdas. you had no tank , no set up for a yasou to be able to pull big  ults in team fights. the enemy clearly out picked you as a whole in champ select. item wise not one of you had an item to shred their hp, no void staff or no ignite how did you plan on killing volibear? he got fed as hell. ekko is feed. no sightstone on support ASHE. there are alot of reasons based just off the screen shot you provided of why your team lost. its not just yasou. 




{{sticker:zombie-brand-mindblown}}
Wow, someone had a bad game against an Ekko lane with ignite Shaco jungle pressure.  That is definite proof.
This post just sparked my decision to go back into Ranked. If I could go against a team with as shitty teamwork yours has, I might be able to get past Silver rank.

yeah from 1 game it might be pretty judge mental to give the guy a lot of shit. I mean it could have been a bad game...or maybe a troll....but 1 game is hardly a good judge of how good he is or whats going on. I do know where you're coming from...when I Q with 4 people and we get a random 5th its always a troll...if I solo Q I get 4 cool people (sometimes) But almost every time we go in with a premade that one guy is always a loser....well 90% of the time.

A gold could go 0/10 to a bronze. It happens, because someone has more 300 elo doesn't directly correspond to a winning chance of 100% vs someone of lower elo.

There are so many variables, and those include personal mood

what level were your opponents?
what about you and your team-mates are you all at the same rank?
is he actually a bronze or did he just play like a bronze?
is he a troll? did he just have a bad game?
if you have a team of 4+1 solo, doesnt the enemy team as well?

these are serious questions and I need answers!
That ashe didn't do so hot either ... must be matchmaking ...

My winrate went really high because I was matched with a bunch of people who are way better than me, now I'm matched with other people way higher than me and now I'm going like 0/20 every game because I don't stand any chance against them. That's probably what happened to the Yasuo.
